  • java.lang.Object

    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanFactoryPostProcessor, org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistryPostProcessor, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, Persister<T>
